OfxImageEffectContext.OfxMessage:
You've added the Stabilize plug-in to an event. This plug-in must be applied to a clip or subclip as a media effect.
To apply media effects, select an event on the timeline (or a clip in the Project Media window) and choose Tools > Video > Media FX. Click the ? button in the Media FX dialog for more information about using the Stabilize plug-in.

You've added the Stabilize plug-in to a track. This plug-in must be applied to a clip or subclip as a media effect.
To apply media effects, select an event on the timeline (or a clip in the Project Media window) and choose Tools > Video > Media FX. Click the ? button in the Media FX dialog for more information about using the Stabilize plug-in.

You've added the Stabilize plug-in to the video output. This plug-in must be applied to a clip or subclip as a media effect.
To apply media effects, select an event on the timeline (or a clip in the Project Media window) and choose Tools > Video > Media FX. Click the ? button in the Media FX dialog for more information about using the Stabilize plug-in.
You must click Apply for changes to take effect.
